title: Delaware Water Gap National Recreation Area: Cultural Resource Management
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     News     Park Newspaper     Cultural Resource Management                CRM Magazine          An entire issue of the National Park Services publication Cultural Resource Management (CRM) was dedicated to Delaware Water Gap National Recreation Area on the occasion of the 10th anniversary of the de-authorization of the Tocks Island Dam:    CRM; Saved from the Dam Vol. 25 No. 3 2002, 6.4 MB pdf    Another issue was dedicated to the Cultural Resource Program of the U.S. Bureau of Reclamation, including archeology at reclamation sites such as dams.  CRM; Dam Good Archeology Vol. 23 No. 1 2000, 6.5 MB pdf
